name: AAAA Word Search -Swipe Puzzle
description:
Word search is a classic word game. You have to find all hidden words on the bottom board. Just choose your word search categories and try to find secret words in 8 directions.

There are 198 puzzles in 11 categories:
- Basci Packs
- Animal Packs
- Food and Drink Packs
- Geography Pack
- HealthPack
- Holiday Pack
- Movie Pack
- History Pack
- Bible Pack
- Science Pack
- Language Pack

MAIN FEATURE:
- 198 Puzzles
- 11 categories
- Easy Choose
- Score Board and Time count
